name: Robot Car Transporter Airplane
description:
Real robot car transporter truck - airplane flight 2019 lets you drive heavy trailer trucks and airplane to transport a variety of robot cars to the different islands of your country. In this robot car transporter game, you would get the chance to load car robots into the cargo truck. Then drive transporter truck towards cargo plane airport for unloading all the sports cars from the heavy truck. Once all the cars are unloaded then load them again into the air plane for taking them to other islands.

*** Features of Robot Car Transporter Airplane 2019 ***
* multiple challenging missions
* variety of robots and cars
* real airport areas
* latest models of cargo planes
* various transporter trucks
* high definition graphics
* realistic city environment
* playable on a vast range of devices
* highly addictive flying game
